videoSnippet.title: Beliavsky Sacrifices a Piece, but Tal Wins the Game!
videoSnippet.description:
#agadmator Alexander Beliavsky vs Mikhail Tal
Sukhumi (1972), Sukhumi URS, rd 10, Aug-28 
Sicilian Defense: Scheveningen Variation. Keres Attack (B81)

1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 d6 3. d4 cd4 4. Nd4 Nf6 5. Nc3 e6 6. g4 a6 7. g5 Nfd7 8. Be3 b5 9. f4 Bb7 10. f5 b4 11. fe6 bc3 12. ef7 Kf7 13. Bc4 Ke8 14. O-O Ne5 15. Qe2 Nbc6 16. Rf5 Qe7 17. Bd5 Nd4 18. Bd4 Bd5 19. ed5 Nc6 20. Qf2 Nd4 21. Qd4 Qa7 22. bc3 Qd4 23. cd4 Be7 24. Rf3 Rc8 25. Rb1 Bg5 26. Rb7 Rf8 27. Rg3

Check out my previous videos https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BL1D09auURU&list=PLDnx7w_xuguFTxcfiM11bB1JchtHclEJg
